hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select tax.tax_master_id, tax.tax_year, tax.quarter_code, (select description_${langCode} from sys_common_code where code_type = 'QUARTER_CODE' and common_code = tax.quarter_code) as quarter_code_desc, tax.wage_type, (select description_${langCode} from sys_common_code where code_type = 'WAGE_TYPE' and common_code = tax.wage_type) as wage_type_desc, tax.gross, tax.resident, tax.non_resident, tax.insert_user_id, to_char(tax.insert_date, '${dateFormat}') as insert_date, tax.update_user_id, to_char(tax.update_date, '${dateFormat}') as update_date from sys_tax_master tax where 1 = 1 ${where_clause} ${auto_fill} ${order_by_clause}
